long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We've made InQuizitive even better for you! Now, when you're answering questions, the choices will stand out more with brighter colors and a clearer design. We've used colors with higher contrast, making it easier for you to spot your intended choice.

Additionally, your scores are getting a visual upgrade. We've added a special section in a cool purple color just for your scores. This section stands out, making it simple to track your progress. It's like a special place to celebrate your achievements.

We've also paid attention to what you said. Your feedback is essential to us, and we're making these changes based on what you've shared. We want to make sure InQuizitive is not just useful but also fun and easy to use.
